title: Sports: Sumo (Usefulness 1)
description: Traveler usefulness 1/10 phrases for the Sumo subcategory within Sports. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Recently, foreign wrestlers have been giving impressive performances in sumo.
cards.romaji: kin'nen, sum dewa gaikokujin rikishi ga subarash. katsuyaku o misete imasu.
cards.japanese: 近年、相撲では外国人力士が素晴らしい活躍を見せています。
